items.name: Event Ticketing
items.short_description: Secure your spot at the festival of your choice with our event ticketing services.

items.name: VIP Experience
items.short_description: Upgrade your festival experience with VIP access, exclusive perks, and premium seating.

items.name: Camping Packages
items.short_description: Enjoy the full festival experience by camping on-site with our convenient packages.

items.name: Food and Beverage
items.short_description: Explore a variety of delicious food and beverage options at the festival grounds.

items.name: Transportation
items.short_description: Ensure hassle-free travel to and from the festival with our transportation services.

items.name: Merchandise Shop
items.short_description: Get festival merchandise to remember your experience and show your support.
